mapper.insert: insert into MARKET(sellername, product, price, category, location, dealtime) values (#{sellername}, #{product}, #{price}, #{category}, #{location}, #{dealtime})
mapper.update: update MARKET set sellername=#{sellername}, product=#{product}, price=#{price}, category=#{category}, location=#{location}, dealtime=#{dealtime} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from MARKET order by seq
